dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT CONCAT(BULK_STOCK_ID_LET, ' ', BULK_STOCK_ID) AS LOTNO, GRADE_NAME, TYPE_DESC, BULK_DET_HB_BAGS, BULK_DET_HB_KGS, BULK_DET_BAG_MARKS, BULK_DET_LIQOUR, BULK_DET_PRICE_50, (BULK_DET_PRICE_50 / 50) * ((60 * BULK_DET_BULK_BAGS) + BULK_DET_BULK_KGS) AS VALUE, BULK_DET_NY_CLOSE AS NYCLOSE, (SELECT STOCK_CBK_NUMBER FROM stocks WHERE STOCK_SL_STOCK_ID = BULK_STOCK_ID LIMIT 1) AS CBK, CASE BULK_STOCK_ID_LET WHEN 'S' THEN (SELECT PURCHASE_NO FROM stocks LEFT JOIN purchases ON STOCK_PURCHASE_ID = PURCHASE_ID WHERE STOCK_SL_STOCK_ID = BULK_STOCK_ID) ELSE '' END AS SALE, WH_DESC, BIN_NAME FROM bulk_details LEFT JOIN types ON bulk_details.BULK_DET_TYPE_CODE = types.TYPE_CODE LEFT JOIN grades ON bulk_details.BULK_DET_GRADE_CODE = grades.GRADE_CODE LEFT JOIN warehouse ON bulk_details.BULK_WAREHOUSE_ID = warehouse.WH_ID LEFT JOIN bin ON bulk_details.BULK_BIN_ID = bin.BIN_ID
